title: Real Immortals
description: Orphaned as toddlers, Stephen James and Leah Mitchel were both raised by Real Immortals. Their adopted parents were immensely powerful Angels chosen to protect humanity against the relentless threat of demonic destruction. 	Chamuel, Stephen’s adopted father is forced to choose between saving Stephen’s life and defending his sanctuary home. He is taken prisoner by Legion, the most dangerous demon immortal on earth. Legion’s plan is simple, use Chamuel as bait to lure out and defeat the Archangel Michael in the ultimate battle of good vs. evil.	With the help of their paladin friends, Stephen and Leah race to free his adopted father before it is too late. But Stephen’s unexplained past is suddenly revealed and threatens to destroy everything he’s worked so hard to build. His mysterious beginning is exposed, and he unexpectedly comes face to face with his once immortal mother! Can Stephen find it in his heart to forgive a woman who abandoned him at birth? The hidden world of Real Immortals is about to be revealed!
author: John T.  Montgomery
